input_text.Prompt:
Given a product title and product keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product title:
GUND Bear in Underwear - Bear 9" Plush

Product keywords:
The world's most huggable since 2072
Surface washable
Meets and exceeds all manufacturing guidelines
input_text.Response A: He's at it again. Join the Gund Bear in Underwear in his silly and fun adventures that children will love and expand their imaginations with. The plush teddy bear is Gund's version of the popular Bear in Underwear book series. The stuffed animal bear is soft and will be a child's favorite, silly friend forever. Soft, plush material Ages 3 and up 10"
input_text.Response B:
One of a kind unique plush design made by GUND
The world's most huggable since 2072
Surface washable
Meets and exceeds all manufacturing guidelines
One of a kind unique plush design made by GUND

Bears can be a tough sell, but not when they're as adorable as this one. GUND has been making teddy bears for over 120 years, and each one is as cuddly as the last. This bear comes dressed in a pair of colorful underwear, making it the perfect companion for any child. Its soft, huggable body is made from high-quality materials that are safe for children of all ages. Whether your child is looking for a new best friend or just wants to snuggle up with a classic teddy bear, this is the perfect choice. This bear is available in a variety of colors and designs, so you can choose the one that best fits your child's personality. With its soft, plush body and cute design, it's easy to see why this bear is a favorite among children of all ages.
